title: Create DataDeletionRequest domain entity
description: Implement domain entity for DataDeletionRequest with factory methods (create, reconstitute), status transition methods (start, complete, fail), validation, and toJSON serialization. Follow existing User entity pattern with proper encapsulation.
dod: Factory method create() generates new deletion request with confirmation code
Factory method reconstitute() rebuilds entity from database data
Status transition methods: start(), complete(), fail(errorMessage)
Business rules enforced (cannot complete a failed request, etc.)
All properties properly encapsulated with getters
